title: Did Trump Admin Ask Supreme Court to Legalize Firing LGBTQ Workers?
subtitle: News websites reported on a pair of potentially significant cases on the court's docket in the fall of 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Trump's Department of Justice asked the U.S. Supreme Court to rule, in two consolidated cases, in a way that would establish the legality of employers' firing workers on the basis of their sexual orientation.
